8a) There is a strong positive relationship between the predictor and response.

```{r}
model = lm(mpg~horsepower)
summary(model)
confint(model)
```

8aiv)

```{r}
predict(model, data.frame(horsepower = 98),interval = "confidence")
predict(model, data.frame(horsepower = 98),interval = "prediction")
```

8b)

```{r}
plot(horsepower, mpg)
abline(model)
```

8c) Heteroscedastic, too many data points bunched in 1 area, high leverage points

```{r}
par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
plot(model)
```
